hoipolloi
Class KeyValue

java.lang.Object
  hoipolloi.KeyValue
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable
public class KeyValue
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable

A KeyValue Class to store integer key and string value pairs. This comes in handy when getting info from a database and you want to store the key from the database and a column of some text. The reason I made this is because Swing combo boxes don't store two seperate values only one for text and a generic index, so instead of setting the index to be the same as my keys from the database, I just have an ArrayList or other collection of KeyValue objects.

Since:
November 26, 2006
Version:
1.1
Author:
Brandon Tanner
